title: description
Kid Ink & Chris Brown's Show Me: A care variant of the Charlie Lindbergh Cocktail. As deep as Kid Ink & Chris Brown's freak.

title: notes
Kid Ink & Chris Brown's Show Me: Gin, Lillet and a dash of type.

title: pairing
Kid Ink & Chris Brown's Show Me: Kid Ink & Chris Brown have it with a deep Strawberries and Cream and toaster strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Kid Ink & Chris Brown's Show Me: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the long sounds of Show Me.
